channel.title: 🏢 State Key Laboratory of Cognitive Intelligence on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 State Key Laboratory of Cognitive Intelligence on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Computerized Adaptive Testing via Collaborative Ranking
item.description: Collaborative Computerized Adaptive Testing (CCAT) improves student ranking accuracy in online exams by leveraging inter-student information to enhance ranking consistency.
